医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
混合免疫和疫苗印记：针对 Omicron 再感染的强大防御最近的研究探讨了混合免疫和纯疫苗印记对 omicron 再感染的影响。研究结果表明，长期印记人群具有有效的保护和免疫反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230625/Hybrid-immunity-and-vaccine-Imprinting-Powerful-defenses-against-Omicron-reinfection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230625/Hybrid-immunity-and-vaccine-Imprinting-Powerful-defenses-against-Omicron-reinfection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a6ca99b7-c211-4d15-b992-60065c6c2c78 Sun, 25 Jun 2023 23:16:00 -0400 Hybrid immunity and vaccine Imprinting: Powerful defenses against Omicron reinfection
产前家庭空气污染与出生体重下降和婴儿肺炎风险增加有关怀孕期间家里的空气污染会影响婴儿的体重并增加患肺炎的风险。这项研究强调了从怀孕早期开始使用清洁燃料炉的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230625/Prenatal-household-air-pollution-linked-to-reduced-birth-weight-and-increased-infant-pneumonia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230625/Prenatal-household-air-pollution-linked-to-reduced-birth-weight-and-increased-infant-pneumonia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee498e88-b392-4953-b1ab-e8fe2cd50ca3 Sun, 25 Jun 2023 23:05:00 -0400 Prenatal household air pollution linked to reduced birth weight and increased infant pneumonia risk
居住在绿色空间附近可降低非传染性疾病的死亡风险充分接触住宅绿地可以降低与非传染性疾病相关的死亡风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230625/Living-near-green-spaces-linked-to-lower-mortality-risk-from-non-communicable-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230625/Living-near-green-spaces-linked-to-lower-mortality-risk-from-non-communicable-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6fc90506-aef5-43e7-8168-b5db3f4d17c2 Sun, 25 Jun 2023 20:59:00 -0400 Living near green spaces linked to lower mortality risk from non-communicable diseases
衰老细胞解开头发生长的秘密研究结果表明，毛发干细胞调节毛发生长的特殊途径是由衰老过程中的真皮黑素细胞介导的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230625/Senescent-cells-unlock-the-secret-to-luscious-hair-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230625/Senescent-cells-unlock-the-secret-to-luscious-hair-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=877c9b65-cb9b-40b4-ab23-7835d63867ac Sun, 25 Jun 2023 20:46:00 -0400 Senescent cells unlock the secret to luscious hair growth
组蛋白乙酰转移酶：癌症治疗的有希望的靶标宣布在《药物学报》杂志上发表新文章。组蛋白赖氨酸酰化是一类主要的组蛋白翻译后修饰，参与重要的生物活性，例如转录调节、DNA 损伤、修复和细胞周期进程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230625/Histone-乙酰转移酶-Promising-targets-for-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230625/Histone-乙酰转移酶-Promising-targets-for-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d51c553f-5423-4712-80c5-18e4a332e57d Sun, 25 Jun 2023 20:17:00 -0400 Histone acetyltransferases: Promising targets for cancer treatment
使用深度学习算法自动检测咬合面龋齿使用深度学习算法从临床照片检测咬合面龋齿的诊断研究将在 IADR 第 101 届大会上提出，该大会将与第九届拉丁美洲地区会议和第 12 届世界大会同时举行预防牙科会议将于 2023 年 6 月 21 日至 24 日在哥伦比亚波哥大举行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230625/Using-deep-learning-algorithm-for-automated-detection-of-occlusal-caries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230625/Using-deep-learning-algorithm-for-automated-detection-of-occlusal-caries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01c4e8ec-e4bf-47bb-99e7-3e63f0d5b4bc Sun, 25 Jun 2023 13:02:59 -0400
受抑郁症影响的患者更有可能停止服用心脏药物根据今天在欧洲心脏病学会科学大会 ACNAP 2023 上发表的研究，植入心脏装置后感觉情绪低落的患者比没有抑郁症的患者更有可能停止服用心脏药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230625/Patients-affected-by-depression-more-likely-to-stop-take-their-heart-medications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230625/Patients-affected-by-depression-more-likely-to-stop-take-their-heart-medications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b267b0f-9cd3-4d60-8890-39b4d83c40fe Sun, 25 Jun 2023 12:58:20 -0400 Patients affected by depression more likely to stop taking their heart medications
专家发布澳大利亚安全阿片类药物停用新指南澳大利亚和国际专家发布了 11 条建议，说明临床医生何时、如何以及在什么情况下适合减少阿片类药物的使用，将患者置于等式的中心。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230625/Experts-release-new-guidelines-for-safe-opioid-deprescribing-in-Australia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230625/Experts-release-new-guidelines-for-safe-opioid-deprescribing-in-Australia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5427366a-52fa-4167-9d59-2f56fdca2b56 Sun, 25 Jun 2023 12:53:34 -0400 Experts release new guidelines for safe opioid deprescribing in Australia
儿童税收抵免每月付款与改善成人健康和粮食安全有关加州大学洛杉矶分校领导的新研究表明，在大流行期间临时扩大联邦儿童税收抵免范围内，每月向符合条件的家庭支付现金可以改善成人健康和粮食安全。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230625/Child-tax-credit-monthly- payments-linked-to-improved-adult-health-and-food-security.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230625/Child-tax-credit-monthly- payments-linked-to-improved-adult-health-and-food-security.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ddb0b16-78e3-4d5b-9406-5741b4ca99f1 Sun, 25 Jun 2023 12:03:04 -0400 Child tax credit monthly payments linked to improved adult health and food security
巴斯婴儿实验室探索幼儿如何看待世界并与世界互动巴斯大学的一个新设施将于本周末（6 月 24 日星期六）的一次公共活动中正式开放，以展示巴斯婴儿实验室的工作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230624/Bath-Babylab-to-explore-how-young-children-see-and-interact-with-the-world.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230624/Bath-Babylab-to-explore-how-young-children-see-and-interact-with-the-world.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d4d9320-527e-41ee-954e-849adeef61e5 Sat, 24 Jun 2023 06:16:00 -0400 Bath Babylab to explore how young children see and interact with the world
